## Masp Museum in Sao Paulo
```{r,echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

  site <- '<a href="http://masp.art.br/">Masp Museum</a>'
  map <- data.frame(lat=-23.5615178, 
                    lng=-46.6581976)
  
map %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(popup=site)
```
